original_title: Usina-Desejo Contra a Indústria do Medo
overview: Bill and Penelope are filmmakers who live together during a terrible era in Brazil. After a disaster, Bill's job hangs in the balance. Penelope introduces him to Usina-Desejo, channel of the Tarlogue Oracle on Youtube, which introduces the duo to a world full of mysteries. The end of this misadventure you decide
title: Usina-Desejo Contra a Indústria do Medo
